Zoro.Description: A swordsman who wields three swords with devastating power and precision.

Sanji.Description: A cook and martial artist who fights using his powerful legs.

Usopp.Description: A sharpshooter who relies on trickery, gadgets, and incredible luck.

Chopper.Ability: Can transform to boost stats temporarily
Chopper.Description: A doctor who can transform into different forms with the Rumble Ball.

Franky.Description: A cyborg shipwright with immense strength and weaponry.

Brook.Description: A musician swordsman with the power of the Revive-Revive fruit.

Jinbe.Description: A fish-man master of Fish-Man Karate and powerful underwater combat.

Naruto.Ability: Boosts ATK when HP is low
Naruto.Description: A ninja with immense chakra reserves and the power of the Nine-Tails fox.

Sasuke.Ability: High chance to land critical attacks
Sasuke.Description: A genius ninja with Sharingan and mastery of lightning techniques.

Sakura.Description: A kunoichi with immense physical strength and medical ninjutsu expertise.

Kakashi.Ability: Copies enemy abilities once per battle
Kakashi.Description: The Copy Ninja, feared for his Sharingan and tactical genius.

Itachi.Ability: Can disable an enemy for one turn
Itachi.Description: A prodigy of the Uchiha clan, wielder of the Mangekyo Sharingan.

Madara.Description: One of the strongest shinobi in history, founder of the Uchiha clan.

Gaara.Description: The Kazekage who manipulates sand to protect and crush enemies.

Rock Lee.Ability: Can boost SPD greatly for short time
Rock Lee.Description: A taijutsu specialist who overcomes limits with pure effort.

Neji.Description: A genius of the Hyuga clan, skilled with the Byakugan.

Goku.Description: A Saiyan warrior who constantly breaks his limits.

Vegeta.Ability: Boosts ATK after each received hit
Vegeta.Description: The proud prince of the Saiyans with unmatched battle spirit.

Gohan.Ability: Boosts power when allies are defeated
Gohan.Description: The son of Goku, capable of hidden surges of strength.

Piccolo.Description: A Namekian warrior with regeneration and tactical brilliance.

Trunks.Description: A time-traveling Saiyan warrior with a sword and immense potential.

Frieza.Ability: Deals extra damage to weakened enemies
Frieza.Description: The galactic emperor with terrifying transformations.

Cell.Ability: Heals HP after defeating an enemy
Cell.Description: A bio-android with the abilities of the strongest fighters.

Majin Buu.Description: A magical creature with immense regenerative powers and unpredictable attacks.

Jiren.Ability: ATK rises with each incoming attack
Jiren.Description: A warrior from Universe 11 with near-unmatched power and stamina.

Beerus.Ability: Chance to instantly obliterate an enemy
Beerus.Description: The God of Destruction with divine power and overwhelming speed.

Ichigo.Description: A Soul Reaper with immense spiritual power, able to wield multiple transformations.

Rukia.Description: A Soul Reaper who commands ice and spiritual energy to control the battlefield.

Renji.Description: A brash Soul Reaper with strong sword techniques and persistence in battle.

Byakuya.Ability: Can immobilize enemy for a turn
Byakuya.Description: A noble Soul Reaper with deadly precision and control over his sword petals.

Aizen.Description: A former Soul Reaper captain with genius intellect and illusion mastery.

Urahara.Description: A former captain with inventive strategies and trick-based combat techniques.

Yoruichi.Description: A master of speed and stealth, able to move faster than the eye can see.

Kenpachi.Ability: Boosts ATK after each hit received
Kenpachi.Description: A berserker Soul Reaper who thrives in raw combat and battle frenzy.

Grimmjow.Description: An Arrancar with aggressive combat style and fast, lethal attacks.

Ulquiorra.Ability: Chance to reduce enemy HP drastically
Ulquiorra.Description: A cold and analytical Arrancar with devastating energy techniques.

Saitama.Description: A hero for fun. His first attack is devastatingly powerful.

Tatsumaki.Description: A psychic hero capable of devastating telekinetic attacks.

Bang.Description: An experienced martial artist with precise and overwhelming strikes.

Garou.Description: A monster hunter turned anti-hero with incredible martial arts prowess.

Deku.Ability: ATK increases with each hit taken
Deku.Description: A young hero-in-training who can use One For All to enhance his abilities.

Bakugo.Description: A hero-in-training with powerful explosive quirk and aggressive style.

Todoroki.Ability: Switches between fire and ice for advantage
Todoroki.Description: A dual-quirk hero-in-training with fire and ice abilities.

All Might.Description: The Symbol of Peace, overwhelming enemies with raw power and hero charisma.

Shigaraki.Ability: Decay spreads to enemies on touch
Shigaraki.Description: A villain capable of destroying anything he touches with his quirk.

Dabi.Description: A villain who controls powerful blue flames to incinerate foes.

Endeavor.Description: The number two hero who wields intense fire quirk with mastery.

Edward Elric.Description: A prodigy alchemist capable of transmuting materials instantly in battle.

Alphonse Elric.Ability: Can absorb damage to shield allies
Alphonse Elric.Description: A gentle giant bound in armor, using defensive skills to protect friends.

Roy Mustang.Description: The Flame Alchemist, using fire-based attacks with precision and strategy.

Scar.Ability: Deals extra damage to enemies with armor
Scar.Description: A vengeful alchemist who targets enemy weaknesses with deadly precision.

Hohenheim.Description: A wise and powerful alchemist with long-lasting defensive abilities.

Eren Jaeger.Ability: Transforms into Titan to boost ATK
Eren Jaeger.Description: A determined soldier who can transform into a powerful Titan to fight.

Mikasa Ackerman.Description: A skilled soldier with incredible agility and precision strikes.

Armin Arlert.Description: A brilliant strategist able to manipulate the battlefield to his advantage.

Levi Ackerman.Ability: Critical hit chance rises with SPD
Levi Ackerman.Description: Humanity’s strongest soldier, known for unmatched speed and precision.

Erwin Smith.Ability: Boosts team ATK and SPD temporarily
Erwin Smith.Description: A brilliant commander capable of inspiring troops and tactical maneuvers.

Reiner Braun.Description: A warrior with the power of the Armored Titan, balancing offense and defense.

Zeke Jaeger.Description: A strategic fighter able to manipulate Titans and the battlefield.

Tanjiro Kamado.Description: A demon slayer with incredible sword skills and water breathing techniques.

Nezuko Kamado.Description: A demon with protective instincts and enhanced combat abilities.

Zenitsu Agatsuma.Ability: High chance of critical attack when scared
Zenitsu Agatsuma.Description: A demon slayer whose lightning-fast strikes excel under fear-induced stress.

Inosuke Hashibira.Description: A wild and aggressive demon slayer using brute strength and speed.

Kyojuro Rengoku.Ability: Flame attacks deal extra damage over time
Kyojuro Rengoku.Description: A fiery pillar who ignites his enemies with passionate sword strikes.

Giyu Tomioka.Description: A water-breathing demon slayer with precise, controlled attacks.

Muzan Kibutsuji.Description: The demon king with near-immortal regenerative abilities and deadly attacks.

Killua Zoldyck.Description: A skilled assassin with lightning speed and deadly precision.

Gon Freecss.Ability: ATK increases after defeating an enemy
Gon Freecss.Description: A young hunter with boundless potential and relentless determination.

Kurapika.Ability: Deals extra damage to chains enemies
Kurapika.Description: A vengeful hunter with chain-based attacks targeting specific enemies.

Leorio.Description: A medical student and fighter supporting allies with healing potential.

Hisoka.Description: A cunning magician with unpredictable and deadly attacks.

Chrollo Lucilfer.Description: The leader of the Phantom Troupe, skilled in stealing and using enemy powers.

Meliodas.Description: The Dragon’s Sin of Wrath, capable of immense power and demonic attacks.

Ban.Description: The Fox’s Sin of Greed, nearly immortal and extremely agile in combat.

Diane.Ability: Can crush enemies with immense strength
Diane.Description: The Serpent’s Sin of Envy, a giant warrior with overwhelming physical power.

King.Ability: Can attack from long range with Spirit Spear
King.Description: The Grizzly’s Sin of Sloth, master of aerial combat with deadly spear attacks.

Merlin.Ability: Can use magic to control battlefield
Merlin.Description: The Boar’s Sin of Gluttony, a powerful mage with wide array of spells.

Escanor.Description: The Lion’s Sin of Pride, whose strength becomes overwhelming during the day.

Asta.Description: A magicless boy with immense physical power and anti-magic abilities.

Yuno.Ability: Wind magic boosts SPD and ATK
Yuno.Description: A talented mage whose wind magic allows fast and powerful strikes.

Noelle Silva.Description: A water magic user capable of both attack and shielding allies.

Yami Sukehiro.Ability: Dark magic attacks deal extra damage
Yami Sukehiro.Description: Captain of Black Bulls, using dark magic for heavy attacks and versatility.

Luck Voltia.Description: An excitable fighter who thrives in fast-paced combat situations.

Magna Swing.Description: A hot-headed mage who uses flame magic to overwhelm opponents.

Soma Yukihira.Description: A chef with creative combat techniques, turning cooking into battle advantage.

Erina Nakiri.Description: A culinary prodigy who can inspire others to perform better in combat.

Kirito.Description: The Black Swordsman who can use two swords for fast and deadly combos.

Asuna.Ability: Fast attacks with high critical chance
Asuna.Description: A skilled swordswoman who strikes quickly and accurately in battle.

Light Yagami.Ability: Chance to instantly defeat a weakened enemy
Light Yagami.Description: A genius strategist with the deadly power of the Death Note.

L.Ability: Can predict enemy moves once per turn
L.Description: A detective prodigy capable of anticipating enemy actions.

Vash the Stampede.Ability: Dodges all attacks once per turn
Vash the Stampede.Description: The Humanoid Typhoon, an agile gunman with incredible reflexes.

Wolfwood.Ability: Heavy gun attack hits all enemies
Wolfwood.Description: A priest-turned-gunslinger wielding a cross-shaped weapon with power.

Allen Walker.Description: An exorcist with cursed powers that slowly weaken enemies.

Lenalee Lee.Ability: Speed boost allows double attack chance
Lenalee Lee.Description: An agile exorcist with combat skills focused on speed and mobility.

Edward Newgate (Whitebeard).Description: One of the strongest pirates, capable of massive destruction with his quakes.

Shanks.Description: A legendary pirate whose presence alone can weaken opponents.

Kaido.Description: A near-immortal pirate who can transform into a powerful dragon.

Big Mom.Description: A pirate empress capable of controlling souls to attack and defend.

Charlotte Katakuri.Description: A strong fighter able to predict enemy movements with precision.

Monkey D. Dragon.Description: Leader of the Revolutionary Army, controlling weather for devastating attacks.

Portgas D. Ace.Description: A fire-wielding pirate whose flames consume enemies gradually.

Kuzan (Aokiji).Description: A former admiral who can freeze opponents and terrain instantly.

Borsalino (Kizaru).Description: A marine admiral capable of attacking at the speed of light.

Sakazuki (Akainu).Description: A strict admiral whose magma powers can destroy multiple enemies at once.

Monkey D. Luffy.Description: A rubber-bodied pirate with stretching abilities to enhance attacks.

Genos.Ability: Incineration beam damages all enemies in a line
Genos.Description: A cyborg hero with powerful ranged attacks.

Fubuki.Description: A psychic B-class hero with supportive and attack skills.

Bang (Silver Fang).Description: An old master martial artist capable of fast dual strikes.

Atomic Samurai.Ability: Sword slice hits all enemies in line
Atomic Samurai.Description: A swordsman hero able to cut multiple enemies at once.

Child Emperor.Ability: Tech deploys mini-robots for multi-hit attacks
Child Emperor.Description: A genius child hero using inventions to overwhelm enemies.

Metal Knight.Description: A robot hero capable of launching devastating ranged attacks.

Zombieman.Description: An immortal hero with unmatched healing abilities.

Watchdog Man.Description: A hero known for his incredible speed and impact.

Drive Knight.Ability: Laser cannon hits one enemy with high damage
Drive Knight.Description: A mysterious cyborg hero capable of precise high-damage attacks.

Metal Bat.Ability: Gets stronger after each hit received
Metal Bat.Description: A hero whose rage boosts his attack power progressively.
